alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Coastal Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 16 at 9:18AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 24. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Coastal Kleberg and Coastal Nueces Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until noon CST today. For the Freeze Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 10 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
